title: katarina bug.
body:
so far it happened twice already.

when playing kat, q e r and b doesnt work. i meant it doesnt literally work.

i have tried to disconnect, reset the key settings to default, redesignated keys to different alphabet, even clicking manually to use it, but it doesnt go out. u can imagine how frustrating it can be if 3/4 of my skills including my ult, and recall doesnt work all of sudden.

one time i was in top class internet gaming cafe, and just then happened at my personal computer.

fix this bug or ban kat until the issue is resolved.

twice i lost because of this stupid ridiculous bug on kat.

replies.body: Just exit and reconnect omg it fixes it everytiem
Never experienced it and i play kat a bunch at the moment, what happens before this error?
